name: Deepwater Settlement
description:
Deepwater Settlement is a resource management game where you try to build deeper and deeper in order to find a rumored substance called "earth".

Gameplay

--------

- You build rooms and harpoons to

  1. Go deeper (You're drying to reach the bottom)

  2. Hunt sea creatures for their food, bone, and.. plastic.

- Settlers eat food. When the food drops to 0, the game ends (and you didn't win).

- If you build to the bottom, you win.

Controls

--------

- Use WSAD to look around.

- To control settlers. Click on the settler, then their destination station.

Tips

----

- Click "How do I play" for all of the instructions.

- There are 4 kinds of sea creatures. They drop different amounts of each matierial.


Known issues

-----

- In the WebGL version, characters sometimes freeze when reeling a fish. Move the character to unfreeze it.

- Due to time mismanagement, there's no sound or music.
